Save and exit

#Open terminal Debian/Ubuntu

```
git checkout v24.10.1
```

```
./scripts/feeds update -a
./scripts/feeds install -a
```

```
make menuconfig
```

```
make -j10
```
or
```
make -j10 V=s
```
